code.displayName: Physician Assistants and Advanced Practice Nursing Providers
Physician Assistants and Advanced Practice Nursing Providers
Relevant diagnostic tests and/or laboratory data

td.content: s:pt presents with 6 days history of mild cough. patient also reports mild fatigue, mild fever, Respiratory. pt is a 51 YO f. she states she has never smoked a cigarette in her life she drinks alcohol heavily for the past 5 years o:Height 170 cm, Weight 64.7 kg, Temperature 37.1 C, Pulse 83, SystolicBP 110, DiastolicBP 74, Respiration 18, HEENT: WNL, Pulm: effortless, all lung fields, enlarged nontender cervical lymph nodes, Heart = RRR, Normal S1/S2, no murmurs a:Tuberculosis p:performed E/M Level 3 (new patient) - Completed, and prescribed Isoniazid - 100 mg tab, and ordered PPD.

Term.SOAP_SECTION: head, eyes, ears, nose, throat Examination

content2.Unmatched: effortless , all lung fields , enlarged nontender cervical lymph nodes , Heart = RRR , Normal S

td.content: s:female massage therapist aged 52 yrs presents with 3 months history of mild fatigue, mild fever and mild cough. o:Height 170 cm, Weight 63.5 kg, Temperature 36.6 C, Pulse 73, SystolicBP 109, DiastolicBP 68, Respiration 15, HEENT: WNL, Pulm: effortless, all lung fields, enlarged nontender cervical lymph nodes, Heart = RRR, Normal S1/S2, no murmurs a:Tuberculosis p:performed E/M Level 3 (established patient) - Completed, and prescribed Isoniazid - 100 mg tab, and ordered PPD.

Term.SOAP_SECTION: head, eyes, ears, nose, throat Examination

content2.Unmatched: effortless , all lung fields , enlarged nontender cervical lymph nodes , Heart = RRR , Normal S
